```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r load_libraries}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r load_data}
data_annotation <- read_csv("~/apply_on_all/total_listened_time.csv")

```

```{r clean_data}
colnames(data_annotation) <- c("file", "extra", "makeup", "skip", "overlap", "subregions")

data_annotation_clean <- data_annotation %>%
  separate(file, c("subject", "month"), "_") %>%
  filter(month != "06" & month != "07")

```

```{r first_dive}

data_annotation_clean %>%
  filter(subject == "39")
```
